participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, Liam enjoys exploring new cuisines and cultures.
participant_1.background: i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i'm not using it. hey there i'm 23 and i love food.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and a bit quirky, Sophie embraces her unique style and has a playful approach to life.
participant_2.background: i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

content.text: Can you help me on bsc final year zoology subjects
